tweet_text: @Olerbia Yeah, there were several active shooter incidents  while I was in the military. But I worked in an armory so whenever that happened we’d just seal all the doors and windows and wait for base security to let us know the incident was over.

tweet_text:
rolling his eyes, he turned back to the stove, izuku's scarred hands were around his waist. 

"mmm, is that so?" izuku murmured, leaving open mouthed kiss along his exposed shoulder to his neck. 

"if you don't stop, you're going to eat the burnt food, dumbass."
